    AI-Powered Code Assistant

    November 2025
    Natural Language to Code Generation
    Empowering developers to write code faster using AI-driven suggestions and auto-completion.
    Built an intelligent code assistant that uses GPT-4 to generate code snippets, refactor existing code, and provide real-time debugging suggestions. Integrated with VS Code for seamless workflow.
    Python OpenAI API TypeScript React

    Real-Time Collaboration Platform

    September 2025
    Cloud-Based Document Editing
    Enabling seamless real-time collaboration for distributed teams across the globe.
    Developed a real-time collaborative document editing platform with conflict resolution, live cursors, and presence indicators. Supports rich text formatting and version history.
    Next.js WebSocket MongoDB Redis AWS Lambda

    Visual Showcase

    Interactive Data Dashboard

    December 2025
    Real-time Analytics Visualization
    A dynamic dashboard designed to visualize complex datasets in real-time. Users can filter data, zoom into specific timeframes, and export reports. The screenshot demonstrates the multi-layered graph rendering engine in action.

    Algorithm Visualizer

    November 2025
    Sorting & Pathfinding Demos
    An educational tool that visualizes common algorithms like QuickSort, MergeSort, and A* Pathfinding. The GIF shows the step-by-step execution of the A* algorithm finding the shortest path in a grid.
